actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to facilitate the use of amounts from individual retirement plans to pay long-term health care insurance premiums, educational expenses, and first home acquisition costs.
short_title: Long-Term Care, Education, and Housing Assistance Act of 1989

summary.text: Long-Term Care, Education, and Housing Assistance Act of 1989 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the penalty on early distributions from individual retirement plans distributions for: (1) long-term health care insurance premiums; and (2) educational expenses for higher education or a vocational school. Provides a tax exclusion for distributions from such plans used to acquire a first home. Limits such distribution to $10,000.

titles.title: Long-Term Care, Education, and Housing Assistance Act of 1989

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to facilitate the use of amounts from individual retirement plans to pay long-term health care insurance premiums, educational expenses, and first home acquisition costs.
